info.title: Holiday Planner API
info.description: This is the API documentation for the Holiday Planner application.

post.description: Authenticate a user using email and password to obtain an access token.

message.example: Provided email or password is incorrect

post.description: Revoke the authenticated user's access token to log them out.

message.description: Error message indicating the user is not authenticated

post.description: Register a new user and return an access token.

items.example: The email has already been taken.
The password confirmation does not match.

get.summary: Retrieve a list of holiday plans

403.description: Access to the resource is forbidden

title: The title is mandatory and cannot be empty.
description: The description is required and cannot be left blank.
date: The date is required and must be in the format YYYY-MM-DD.
The date must be today or a future date.
location: The location is mandatory and cannot be empty.
participants: Participants must be an array if provided.
There must be at least one participant if the participants field is provided.

403.description: Access to the resource is forbidden

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the holiday plan to be updated

title: The title must be a valid string if provided.
The title cannot exceed 255 characters if provided.
description: The description must be a valid string if provided.
date: The date must be in the correct format: YYYY-MM-DD if provided.
The date must be today or a future date if provided.
location: The location must be a valid string if provided.
The location cannot exceed 255 characters if provided.
participants: Participants must be an array if provided.
There must be at least one participant if the participants field is provided.

403.description: Access to the resource is forbidden

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the holiday plan to be deleted

403.description: Access to the resource is forbidden

get.description: Generate and download a PDF file of the holiday plan with the specified ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the holiday plan to generate the PDF for

message.description: Error message when the plan is not found
Error message indicating the user is not authenticated

get.summary: Get a list of soft-deleted holiday plans

403.description: Access to the resource is forbidden

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the user to update

password_confirmation.description: Confirmation of the password (required if password is provided)

name: The name field is required.
email: The email must be a valid email address.
The email has already been taken.
password: The password must be at least 8 characters.
The password must contain at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, one number, and one special character.
The password confirmation does not match.
password_confirmation: The password confirmation is required when the password is present.

403.description: Access to the resource is forbidden

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the user to delete

403.description: Access to the resource is forbidden
Access to the resource is forbidden

token.description: Access token for the newly created user

name: The name field is required.
email: The email must be a valid email address.
The email has already been taken.
password: The password must be at least 8 characters.
The password must contain at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, one number, and one special character.
The password confirmation does not match.

403.description: Access to the resource is forbidden

HolidayPlan.title: Holiday Plan
HolidayPlan.description: Model representation of a Holiday Plan

id.description: Unique identifier for the holiday plan

description.description: Detailed description of the holiday plan
description.example: A 15-day trip to the beach with family.

participants.description: List of participants in the holiday plan

created_at.description: Timestamp when the holiday plan was created

updated_at.description: Timestamp when the holiday plan was last updated

deleted_at.description: Timestamp when the holiday plan was soft-deleted
